name: BLOC-K
description:
You are Agent K - imprisoned within a Soviet-styled bunker in the near future. You have been left to die, tied to a chair, gagged and with a box over your head. You aretotally in the dark. To make matters worse, you have been tortured to the point ofamnesia. Your job is to discover, enemy battle plansand secret messages - who you are, where you are, how and why you have foundyourself trapped in an enemy bunker, how to escape and…how to save theworld…all in 15 minutes.

Do you have what it takes to save the world and escape the bunker with your life?
